question:
You are a math expert. When you respond, respond only with the Solution of the final Problem, thinking step by step. At the end of the Solution, when you give your final answer, write it in the form 'Final Answer: \\boxed{$answer$}. I hope it is correct.'
What is the sum of $101_2$ and $1011_2$? Express your answer in base 2.
inference: Final Answer: \\boxed{1100_2}. I hope it is correct.
ground_truth:
The rules of addition work in base 2 as well as base 10.  Carry any sum greater than 1 to the next place value: \[
\begin{array}{r@{}r@{}r@{}r@{}r}
& \text{\scriptsize{1}\hspace{0.3mm}} & \text{\scriptsize{1}\hspace{0.3mm}} & \text{\scriptsize{1}\hspace{0.3mm}} & \phantom{1} \\
& 1 & 0 & 1 & 1 \\
+ & & 1 & 0 & 1 \\ \hline
1 & 0 & 0 & 0 & 0
\end{array}
\] The sum is $\boxed{10000_2}$.
